name: TheGhostundertheStairs
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ghost under the stairs
des:
Penny and her parents have just moved into an old house... where a prank-loving ghost resides! Oh no!

Soon, the ghost makes living there unbearable for Penny and her family. Penny must summon all her courage and best the ghost. Will she prevail? Only YOU can help her!

This is not a normal audio book, but a choose your own adventure game. Make all of the decisions and help Penny!

Disclaimer: this skill contains mention of a ghost and pranks for entertainment purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
